attributes.action: Separating Asylum-Seekers' Children: Theresa May, Cancel Trump Visit...
attributes.background: President Trump is taking asylum-seeking children away from their parents at the US border. The UN says this is illegal. Over 2,000 so far. If Trump visits the UK it will be seen around the world as an endorsement. Her Majesty the Queen may have to shake his hand; as a country we cannot allow this.
